author: ChrisD
title: Lovely small hotel in great location - Review
text:
This hotel is very conveniently located for the centre of Paris near Op√©ra. It has a lovely spacious entrance and sitting area, rooms are small but very comfortable, with modern bath/shower and coffee/tea making facilities. Staff kind and helpful. Recommended for a weekend in Paris!
Room Tip: Our rooms looked onto the internal courtyard and were very quiet See more room tips
